title: Time of Day
description: Time of Day takes readers on a journey through a typical day for a child. Students are supported by simple sentences and interesting illustrations that include many types of clocks and watches. A clever use of questions will keep readers engaged in this fun book. Use this familiar set of routines to teach students about sequencing events and using contractions.
meta: afternoon, evening, morning, o'clock, time, tomorrow
